RUB Code and Corpus Repositories Uploaded

16 May 2021

The RUB Corpus and Code has now been updated to host the corpus and code files.

Please find them at https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/corpus and https://pjbraga.github.io/rub_corpus_and_code/code.

For any questions please contact Peter Braga at pjbraga_rubcc@gmail.com.
